name: Party Dispute
description:
How to play:
  • Grab 3 -7 friends and screen share the game (Discord, Zoom, Google Teams etc.)
  • Select how many players will participate in the game (only even numbers work in the current build) and assign them all a name.
  • Two players will randomly be selected to face-off in a debate round with a random topic. They will also be assigned a stand-point towards the point that  they have to argue for.
  • Each player will get 45 seconds to state their argument, as well as 30 seconds for counter arguments.
  • When all time is up, the non-participating players get to vote on who displayed the better argument.
  • The winning player gets a point, and a new round is started.
